lead_paragraph: A reader writes, “Restrictions on funding will have little effect on the election process” until a stop is put to the pursuit of donors.

headline.main: Amount Spent on Political Campaigns: ‘Nothing Short of Obscene’
headline.print_headline: Spending on Campaigns: ‘Nothing Short of Obscene’

snippet: A reader writes, “Restrictions on funding will have little effect on the election process” until a stop is put to the pursuit of donors.
